project.name: IonicVueApp2B-NewsAppExample
project.notes: This project features a FizzBuzz script and a recursive factorial block that you can run and debug inside Snap! and also compile into various text-based programming languages: * JavaScript * Smalltalk * Python * C Enjoy! -Jens

code.doFirebaseImportFireStore: import {getFirestore,collection,doc,setDoc,addDoc,getDocs,getDoc,query,where,updateDoc,deleteDoc} from "https://www.gstatic.com/firebasejs/9.3.0/firebase-firestore.js"; window.<#1> = getFirestore(); window.collection = collection window.doc = doc window.setDoc = setDoc window.addDoc = addDoc window.getDocs = getDocs window.getDoc = getDoc window.query = query window.where = where window.updateDoc = updateDoc window.deleteDoc = deleteDoc
code.doFirebaseImportFireAuth: import {getAuth ,sendEmailVerification, signOut , onAuthStateChanged , signInWithEmailAndPassword , createUserWithEmailAndPassword ,RecaptchaVerifier,signInWithPhoneNumber } from "https://www.gstatic.com/firebasejs/9.3.0/firebase-auth.js"; window.<#1> = getAuth(); window.sendEmailVerification = sendEmailVerification window.signOut = signOut window.onAuthStateChanged = onAuthStateChanged window.signInWithEmailAndPassword = signInWithEmailAndPassword window.createUserWithEmailAndPassword = createUserWithEmailAndPassword window.RecaptchaVerifier = RecaptchaVerifier window.signInWithPhoneNumber = signInWithPhoneNumber

code.doVueFileOptions: const <#1> = { moduleCache: { vue: Vue }, async getFile(url) { var xmlHttp = new XMLHttpRequest(); xmlHttp.open( "GET", url, false ); // false for synchronous request xmlHttp.send( null ); return xmlHttp.responseText; }, addStyle(textContent) { const style = Object.assign(document.createElement('style'), { textContent }); const ref = document.head.getElementsByTagName('style')[0] || null; document.head.insertBefore(style, ref); }, log(type, ...args) { console[type](...args); }, compiledCache: { set(key, str) { for (; ;) { try { // doc: https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Storage window.localStorage.setItem(key, str); break; } catch (ex) { // handle: Uncaught DOMException: Failed to execute 'setItem' on 'Storage': Setting the value of 'XXX' exceeded the quota window.localStorage.removeItem(window.localStorage.key(0)); } } }, get(key) { return window.localStorage.getItem(key); }, } } const {<#2>} = window['vue3-sfc-loader'] ;

list.l: async function handleButtonClick(ev) { popover = await popoverController.create({ component: "popover-example-page", event: ev, translucent: true }); currentPopover = popover; return popover.present(); }
function dismissPopover() { if (currentPopover) { currentPopover.dismiss().then(() => { currentPopover = null; }); } }

customElements.define("popover-example-page", class ModalContent extends HTMLElement { connectedCallback() { this.innerHTML = ` <ion-list> <ion-list-header>Ionic</ion-list-header> <ion-item button>Learn Ionic</ion-item> <ion-item button>Documentation</ion-item> <ion-item button>Showcase</ion-item> <ion-item button>GitHub Repo</ion-item> <ion-item lines="none" detail="false" button onClick="dismissPopover()">Close</ion-item> </ion-list> `; } });

block-definition.code: <#1>

list.l: Vue.onMounted(() => { const slides = document.getElementById("news") ; slides.options = {direction: "vertical", loop: true, autoplay:{delay: 2000} } ; }) function next () { const slides = document.getElementById("news") ; slides.slideNext() ; slides.startAutoplay() ; } function prev () { const slides = document.getElementById("news") ; slides.slidePrev() ; slides.startAutoplay() ; }

scripts.comment: 模擬步驟 1. 下載db內容 (滑鼠移到右邊db， 按下滑鼠右鍵選擇export) 2. 利用該檔案執行 json-server https://github.com/typicode/json-server ( json-server {檔案名稱}) 3. 執行 Run in Html 或 Run in Cloud (Run in Cloud 要登入帳號)

variable.name: code

item.list: content,「望幽谷」又名「忘憂谷」，意指站在高處俯瞰綠色山谷使人「忘」卻所有煩「憂」，是八斗子海濱公園觀景台下方綠油油的青翠谷地，春夏之際綠草如茵，秋冬歲末則變成了一片奶油色的大地。望幽谷是一個Ｖ字型的山谷，除了翠綠的草地，還有八斗子漁港來往的漁船，以及可遠眺海另一端的基隆嶼，夜晚時分海面上漁火點點與九份山城的燈火形成一齣唯美的山海之戀。這裡設有多條的石版步道，漫步至海灘，有豆腐岩與海蝕地形等的地質景觀，還可以抓螃蟹與撿貝類，享受當一日漁夫的體驗。
content,十分瀑布位在平溪鄉，寬度約有四十公尺，高低落差為十五至二十公尺，是一座岩層與溪水流向相反的逆斜層瀑布，也是台灣最大型的簾幕瀑布，因形似尼加拉瀑布，而有「台灣尼加拉瀑布」的美稱。十分瀑布下的潭水深峻，周圍設有安全護欄，此區域長年瀰漫著瀑布的水氣，在陽光的照射之下，瀑布上方即會形成一道綺麗的彩虹，因此又稱為「彩虹淵」。

content,湖口老街興建於民國三年(大正三年)，事實上在興建老街之前，湖口就有兩條老街，分別為「老街」與「橫街」，而現今的老街在當時可是當地居民口中的「新街」。當時「新街」的興建可說是地方上的盛事，也為湖口注入一股新氣象，「新街」落成後市容變得煥然一新，街屋大都為紅磚穹拱方式建築，屋簷口有鳳凰、獅身、花卉等裝飾圖案，相當華麗且獨具特色，而二落或三落式的長形平面店舖是為了能夠「住商混合」使用，這樣的傳統長形店屋在目前已所剩無幾，具有保存意義。當年的「新街」在歷經百年後已成為目前的「老街」，當您走入老街，就彷彿走進時空機一般，古色古香的街道氣氛，讓人懷舊之情不禁湧上心頭，相當值得您的造訪。
